subject: [Radiance-general] ConvergenReferences: <j3r9c0$lv6$1@dough.gmane.org>
body:
<CA868773.8C75%robert.guglielmetti@nrel.gov>
Message-ID: <j466o2$3gb$1@dough.gmane.org>

Thanks.  Yes, I've looked at it and will do more looking.

I am suspecting that no-one has done general convergence studies on the
algorithms used in Radiance, alas.  It would be really useful
information to have in hand for us practitioners.  Sounds like it could
be a PhD dissertation in applied mathematics, though.

Randolph

On 2011-09-02 12:16:06 -0700, Guglielmetti, Robert said:

Randolph
